Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2022/0743 b) Date of Occurrence: 07/12/2024
c) Installation Details: Goliath Lift - AC-9731-610 at
Regional Depot-C
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Propulsion b) Date Component 10/12/2024
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Turbine Assembly d) Main Assembly: Station-1 Starboard
e) Nomenclature: Turbine Assembly Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: Modified
g) Part No.: PR-9736-O9 h) Sl No.: SN-8761-543
i) Firmware Version: Not Applicable j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 26/05/2020 l) Date of Removal: 09/12/2024
Pg No: 70 Ln No: 18 Pg No: 6 Ln No: 30
m) Manufacturing Agency: Apex Defense Manufacturing n) Date, Month & Year April 2015
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: No p) Whether under AMC Yes
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 861 Hrs / 204 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Starter generator malfunction. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 24/12/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings.
Date: 26/12/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome.
Date: 28/12/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable.
Date: 28/12/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type.
Date: 29/12/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
